, Calif.-- Google co-founder Larry Page will take charge of the company's day-to-day operations as chief executive officer, replacing current CEO Eric Schmidt , who will focus on strategic projects and new products. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a statement released by Google." By clarifying our individual roles, we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead
